content.rendered:
Creator Sahir Raza

Directed by Sahir Raza

Written by Chiranjeevi Bajpai. Parikshit Joshi. Sidhanta Mathur. Gauri Pandit

Cast Prit Kamani( Lakshay12 episodes, 2022 ). Anshuman Malhotra( Sameer12 episodes, 2022 ). Mihir Ahuja( Gandhi12 episodes, 2022 ). Vishnu Kaushal( Avinash12 episodes, 2022 ). Inayat Sood( Mahima12 episodes, 2022 ). Himika Bose( Dhriti12 episodes, 2022 ). Chiranjeevi Bajpai( Raheja6 episodes, 2022 ). Neer Raao( Lochabh3 episodes, 2022 ). Leah Khambata( Shivani2 episodes, 2022 ). Mandeep Kumar( Gandhi’s Father1 episode, 2022 )

Language Hindi

Producers Gargi Ganatra. Sangeetha Rao. Sameer Bangara. Sidhanta Mathur

Production Writeous Studios. Lionsgate Play.

Season 2

Total Episodes 6
